chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
data_stream: seq data
choices3: seq bool
choices2: seq bool
choices1: seq bool

Goal:
getLocal cn init_dstatelet = init_heap_c

Premises:

data = seq nid : Set
cn = 0 : nat

Notation seq := list

getLocal = fun (n : nid) (d : dstatelet) => match find (cT:=union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) n (dstate d) with | Some h => h | None => Unit end : nid -> dstatelet -> heap

TwoPhaseCoordinator.coordinator_loop_zero : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts), uniq pts -> pts != [::] -> forall ds : seq data, DHT [cn,mkWorld (TwoPhaseCoordinator.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)] ( fun i : state => getLocal cn (getStatelet i l) = st :-> (0, CInit) \+ log :-> [::], fun=> (fun m : state => exists chs : seq bool, getLocal cn (getStatelet m l) = st :-> (size ds, CInit) \+ log :-> seq.zip chs ds))

coordinator : DHT [cn,mkWorld (TwoPhaseCoordinator.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)] ( fun i : state => getLocal cn (getStatelet i l) = st :-> (0, CInit) \+ log :-> [::], fun=> (fun m : state => exists chs : seq bool, getLocal cn (getStatelet m l) = st :-> (size data_stream, CInit) \+ log :-> seq.zip chs data_stream))
participant_with_choices : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (p : nid), p \in pts -> forall choices : seq bool, DHT [p,mkWorld (TwoPhaseParticipant.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)] ( fun i : state => getLocal p (getStatelet i l) = st :-> (0, PInit) \+ log :-> [::], fun=> (fun m : state => exists (bs : seq bool) (ds : seq data), getLocal p (getStatelet m l) = st :-> (size choices, PInit) \+ log :-> seq.zip bs ds))

TwoPhaseParticipant.TwoPhaseParticipant.participant_with_choices_loop_obligation_1 : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (p : nid) (Hpin : p \in pts) (choices : seq bool), conseq ((fix rec (choices0 : seq bool) : DT p (mkWorld (TwoPhaseParticipant.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)) unit := let program_branch_0 := fun (c : bool) (chs : seq bool) => fun=> with_spec (TwoPhaseParticipant.participant_round l cn pts others Hnin p Hpin c);; rec chs in let program_branch_1 := fun=> ret p (mkWorld (TwoPhaseParticipant.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)) tt in match choices0 as choices' return (choices' = choices0 -> DT p (mkWorld (TwoPhaseParticipant.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)) unit) with | [::] => program_branch_1 | c :: chs => program_branch_0 c chs end (erefl choices0)) choices) (logvar (fun...
init_state = l \\ -> init_dstatelet : state
TwoPhaseCoordinator.coordinator_round : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts), uniq pts -> pts != [::] -> forall d : data, {(e : nat)(lg : Log)}, DHT [cn,mkWorld (TwoPhaseCoordinator.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)] ( fun i : state => getLocal cn (getStatelet i l) = st :-> (e, CInit) \+ log :-> lg, fun (res : bool) (m : state) => getLocal cn (getStatelet m l) = st :-> (e.+1, CInit) \+ log :-> rcons lg (res, d))
Inductive PState : Set := PInit : PState | PGotRequest : data -> PState | PRespondedYes : data -> PState | PRespondedNo : data -> PState | PCommitted : data -> PState | PAborted : data -> PState
TwoPhaseParticipant.participant_round : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (p : nid), p \in pts -> bool -> {el : nat * Log}, DHT [p,mkWorld (TwoPhaseParticipant.tpc l cn pts others Hnin)] ( fun i : state => getLocal p (getStatelet i l) = st :-> (el.1, PInit) \+ log :-> el.2, fun=> (fun m : state => exists (b : bool) (d : data), getLocal p (getStatelet m l) = st :-> (el.1.+1, PInit) \+ log :-> rcons el.2 (b, d)))
TPCProtocol.tpc_coh = fun (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (d : dstatelet) => [/\ TPCProtocol.soupCoh cn pts (dsoup d), dom (cT:=union_mapUMC [ordType of nid] heap) (dstate d) =i TPCProtocol.nodes cn pts others, valid (dstate d) & forall n : nat_eqType, n \in TPCProtocol.nodes cn pts others -> TPCProtocol.localCoh cn pts n (getLocal n d)] : nid -> seq nid -> seq nid -> dstatelet -> Prop Arguments TPCProtocol.tpc_coh _ (_ _)%seq_scope
TwoPhaseInductiveInv.pt_PhaseTwoAbortE : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (d : dstatelet) (e : nat) (dt : data) (lg : Log) (pt : nat_eqType) (to : nat) (ds : heap) (tms : TaggedMessage), let d' := {| dstate := upd (cT:=union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) cn ds (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := tms; from := cn; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} in coh (TwoPhaseInductiveInv.tpc l (cn:=cn) (pts:=pts) others Hnin) d -> pt \in pts -> (pt == to) = false -> (forall z : nat, (z == cn) = false -> getLocal z d' = getLocal z d) ->...-> TwoPhaseInductiveInv.pt_PhaseTwoAbort cn d' e dt lg pt
TwoPhaseCoordinator.coord_loop_spec : Label -> forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), seq nid -> cn \notin pts -> Type
TwoPhaseCoordinator.tpc : Label -> forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), seq nid -> cn \notin pts -> protocol
TwoPhaseParticipant.tpc : Label -> forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), seq nid -> cn \notin pts -> protocol
TwoPhaseParticipant.part_with_choices_loop_spec : Label -> forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), seq nid -> cn \notin pts -> nid -> Type
TPCProtocol.cohMsg = fun (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid) (ms : msg TaggedMessage) (y : nat) => if from ms == cn then to ms \in pts /\ TPCProtocol.msgFromCoordinator (content ms) y else if from ms \in pts then to ms == cn /\ TPCProtocol.msgFromParticipant (content ms) y else True : nid -> seq nid -> msg TaggedMessage -> nat -> Prop Arguments TPCProtocol.cohMsg _ _%seq_scope _ _%nat_scope
TPCProtocol.soupCoh = fun (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid) => Pred_of_Simpl (T:=union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) [Pred s | valid s /\ (forall (m : mid) (ms : msg TaggedMessage), find (cT:=union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage)) m s = Some ms -> exists y : nat, TPCProtocol.cohMsg cn pts ms y)] : nid -> seq nid -> Pred soup Arguments TPCProtocol.soupCoh _ _%seq_scope
Log = seq (bool * seq nat) : Set
TwoPhaseCoordinator.coord_loop : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts), uniq pts -> pts != [::] -> TwoPhaseCoordinator.coord_loop_spec l cn pts others Hnin
TwoPhaseParticipant.participant_with_choices_loop : forall (l : Label) (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (p : nid), p \in pts -> TwoPhaseParticipant.part_with_choices_loop_spec l cn pts others Hnin p
TPCProtocol.nodes = fun (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) => [:: cn] ++ pts ++ others : nid -> seq nid -> seq nid -> seq nid Arguments TPCProtocol.nodes _ (_ _)%seq_scope
TPCProtocol.localCoh = fun (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid) (n : nid) => Pred_of_Simpl (T:=union_map_classPCM heapUMC) [Pred h | valid h /\ (if n == cn then exists (s : CStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else if n \in pts then exists (s : PStateT) (l : Log), h = st :-> s \+ log :-> l else log \notin dom (cT:=heapUMC) h)] : nid -> seq nid -> nid -> Pred heap Arguments TPCProtocol.localCoh _ _%seq_scope
TPCProtocol.l2 : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (d : dstatelet), TPCProtocol.tpc_coh cn pts others d -> valid (dsoup d)
others = [::] : seq nid
cat = fun T : Type => fix cat (s1 s2 : seq T) {struct s1} : seq T := match s1 with | [::] => s2 | x :: s1' => x :: cat s1' s2 end : forall T : Type, seq T -> seq T -> seq T Arguments cat {T}%type_scope (_ _)%seq_scope
pts = [:: p1; p2; p3] : seq nat
seq.zip = fun S T : Type => fix zip (s : seq S) (t : seq T) {struct t} : seq (S * T) := match s with | [::] => [::] | x :: s' => match t with | [::] => [::] | y :: t' => (x, y) :: zip s' t' end end : forall S T : Type, seq S -> seq T -> seq (S * T) Arguments seq.zip {S T}%type_scope (_ _)%seq_scope
rcons = fun T : Type => fix rcons (s : seq T) (z : T) {struct s} : seq T := match s with | [::] => [:: z] | x :: s' => x :: rcons s' z end : forall T : Type, seq T -> T -> seq T Arguments rcons {T}%type_scope _%seq_scope
cats0 : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T), s ++ [::] = s
rely_loc' : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (i j : state), network_rely w this i j -> getLocal this (getStatelet j l) = getLocal this (getStatelet i l)
init_heap_p = st_ptr : -> (0, PInit) \+ log_ptr : -> ([::] : seq (bool * data)) : union_map_classPCM heapUMC
size = fun T : Type => fix size (s : seq T) : nat := match s with | [::] => 0 | _ :: s' => (size s').+1 end : forall T : Type, seq T -> nat Arguments size {T}%type_scope _%seq_scope
empty_lstate = fix empty_lstate (ns : seq nid) : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) := match ns with | [::] => Unit | n :: ns' => n \\ -> Heap.empty \+ empty_lstate ns' end : seq nid -> union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap) Arguments empty_lstate _%seq_scope
cats1 : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T) (z : T), s ++ [:: z] = rcons s z

```intros.
unfold getLocal, init_heap_c, init_dstatelet.
rewrite /find.
rewrite /union_map_classPCM.
rewrite /union_mapUMC.
rewrite /union_mapOrdTypePCM.
rewrite /union_mapUMC.
rewrite /Unit.
rewrite /emptym.
rewrite /find.
rewrite /cfind.
reflexivity.```

original: intros. unfold getLocal, init_heap_c, init_dstatelet. rewrite /find. rewrite /union_map_classPCM. rewrite /union_mapUMC. rewrite /union_mapOrdTypePCM. rewrite /union_mapUMC. rewrite /Unit. rewrite /emptym. rewrite /find. rewrite /cfind. reflexivity.
